text: Edmund Lazell was a member of the Constitutional Convention. He was born in Bridgewater, Massachusetts, USA in 1750. He married Mary Ford and had 2 children. He died on 30 Aug 1842 in Cummington, Hampshire, Massachusetts. *See also: *Horatio Alger ==References== Category:1750 births Category:1842 deaths Category:People from Bridgewater, Massachusetts
title: Edmund Lazell
